spec_data.Name: alsa-plugins-pulseaudio
spec_data.Description:
This plugin allows any program that uses the ALSA API to access a PulseAudio
sound daemon. In other words, native ALSA applications can play and record
sound across a network. There are two plugins in the suite, one for PCM and
one for mixer control.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Tue 14 Nov 2017 04:48:04 AM EST, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
